answers.answer: Depending on your body type it can be. For overweight women, some doctors encourage weight loss because it decreases the probability of gestational diabetes and preeclampsyia.  I was normal weight pre pregnancy and lost weight in the beginning.  I am 15 weeks and have gained 4 lbs now. I was worried it wasn't enough but doctor wasn't concerned. As long as you aren't dieting... Just eat healthy the weight will come.

question: I'm 13+4 weeks and I weigh less now than I did before I got pregnant! Is this normal??
title: weight?
